title: Developer Curb Appeal: Cloud Admin UI: Node link requires left click, can't open in new tab
description:
When you're looking at the nodes in your cluster, you can't right click to open a new window. You're required to replace your current window with the new node.

This doesn't sound a like a big deal on its own, but it combines with other issues to be really annoying.

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content:
The reason for this behaviour is how the graph actually is rendered. The node itself is not really a link (<a> element in html), so you cannot right-click it. 

since i'm not really happy with them right now, i thought already about changing the underlying library and if we do so, we could also change this one.

but for now, it's kind of "can't fix" even if i would ;o
